225.movie_plot: A bomber on board an airplane, an airport almost closed by snow, and various personal problems of the people involved.

138.movie_plot: A blade runner must pursue and try to terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

43.movie_plot: At a 1962 college, Dean Vernon Wormer is determined to expel the entire Delta Tau Chi Fraternity, but those troublemakers have other plans for him.

45.movie_plot: Incompetent police detective Frank Drebin must foil an attempt to assassinate Queen Elizabeth II.

136.movie_plot: A college professor invents an anti-gravity substance which a corrupt businessman wants for himself.

76.movie_plot: A genetically inferior man assumes the identity of a superior one in order to pursue his lifelong dream of space travel.

39.movie_plot: The aliens are coming and their goal is to invade and destroy Earth. Fighting superior technology, mankind's best weapon is the will to survive.

139.movie_plot: A substance designed to help the brain repair itself gives rise to a super-intelligent chimpanzee who leads an ape uprising.

135.movie_name: Back to the Future Part III (1990)
135.movie_plot: Enjoying a peaceable existence in 1885, Doctor Emmet Brown is about to be killed by Buford "Mad Dog" Tannen. Marty McFly travels back in time to save his friend.

1.movie_plot: While home sick in bed, a young boy's grandfather reads him a story called The Princess Bride.

164.movie_plot: In San Francisco, a group of people discover the human race is being replaced one by one, with clones devoid of emotion.

64.movie_plot: Two victims of traumatized childhoods become lovers and psychopathic serial murderers irresponsibly glorified by the mass media.

120.movie_plot: The Griswold family's plans for a big family Christmas predictably turn into a big disaster.

167.movie_plot: James Bond investigates the mid-air theft of a space shuttle, and discovers a plot to commit global genocide.

104.movie_plot: When an alien spacecraft of enormous power is spotted approaching Earth, Admiral Kirk resumes command of the Starship Enterprise in order to intercept, examine and hopefully stop the intruder.

24.movie_plot: A weatherman finds himself inexplicably living the same day over and over again.

148.movie_plot: Spinal Tap, one of England's loudest bands, is chronicled by film director Marty DiBergi on what proves to be a fateful tour.

113.movie_plot: In 1988, Earth makes the first contact with an alien civilization. In 1991, these aliens, known as Newcomers, slowly begin to be integrated into human society after three years of quarantine.

131.movie_plot: James Bond willingly falls into an assassination ploy involving a naive Russian beauty in order to retrieve a Soviet encryption device that was stolen by SPECTRE.

52.movie_plot: A mild-mannered chemist and an ex-con must lead the counterstrike when a rogue group of military men, led by a renegade general, threaten a nerve gas attack from Alcatraz against San Francisco.

98.movie_plot: When a man inadvertantly kills Santa on Christmas Eve, he finds himself magically recruited to take his place.

25.movie_name: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country (1991)
25.movie_plot: On the eve of retirement, Kirk and McCoy are charged with assassinating the Klingon High Chancellor and imprisoned. The Enterprise crew must help them escape to thwart a conspiracy aimed at sabotaging the last best hope for peace.

156.movie_plot: During a cryogenics test, a pilot frozen in 1939 awakes in 1992 but time is running out, as his body starts to age rapidly.

19.movie_plot: A video game based on Terminator 2: Judgment Day (1991).

93.movie_plot: A teenager has to deal with his girlfriend dumping him among family crises, homicidal paper boys, and a rival skier.

51.movie_plot: The IMF is shut down when it's implicated in the bombing of the Kremlin, causing Ethan Hunt and his new team to go rogue to clear their organization's name.

3.movie_plot: Dorothy Gale is swept away from a farm in Kansas to a magical land of Oz in a tornado and embarks on a quest with her new friends to see the Wizard who can help her return home in Kansas and help her friends as well.

127.movie_plot: A boy inadvertently breaks three important rules concerning his new pet and unleashes a horde of malevolently mischievous monsters on a small town.

95.movie_plot: Fearing that the actions of Superman are left unchecked, Batman takes on the Man of Steel, while the world wrestles with what kind of a hero it really needs.

21.movie_plot: A police officer is brought out of suspended animation in prison to pursue an old ultra-violent nemesis who is loose in a non-violent future society.

134.movie_name: Back to the Future Part II (1989)
134.movie_plot: After visiting 2015, Marty McFly must repeat his visit to 1955 to prevent disastrous changes to 1985...without interfering with his first trip.

108.movie_name: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home (1986)
108.movie_plot: To save Earth from an alien probe, Admiral James T. Kirk and his fugitive crew go back in time to San Francisco in 1986 to retrieve the only beings who can communicate with it: humpback whales.

124.movie_plot: A veteran policeman, Murtaugh, is partnered with a younger, suicidal officer, Riggs. They both have one thing in common: hating working in pairs. Now they must learn to work with one another to stop a gang of drug smugglers.

146.movie_plot: A brain surgeon marries a femme fatale, causing his life to turn upside down. Things go more awry when he falls in love with a talking brain.

54.movie_name: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid (1969)
54.movie_plot: Two Western bank/train robbers flee to Bolivia when the law gets too close.

101.movie_plot: Captain Picard, with the help of long presumed dead Captain Kirk, must stop a renegade scientist willing to murder on a planetary scale in order to enter an energy ribbon.

159.movie_plot: When twelve mysterious spacecrafts appear around the world, linguistics professor Louise Banks is tasked with interpreting the language of the apparent alien visitors.

32.movie_plot: Rocky Balboa, a small-time boxer, gets a supremely rare chance to fight heavy-weight champion Apollo Creed in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.

89.movie_plot: A secret agent is sent to Sydney, to find and destroy a genetically modified disease called "Chimera".

71.movie_plot: Three former parapsychology professors set up shop as a unique ghost removal service.

116.movie_plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

166.movie_plot: A former cop turned street-hustler accidentally uncovers a conspiracy in Los Angeles in 1999.
